description.english: Acquire the fully powered Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device.
description.german: Holen Sie sich das voll aufgeladene mobile Portalgerät von Aperture Science.
description.french: Emparez-vous du générateur à deux portails d'Aperture Science.
description.italian: Acquisisci tutta la potenza del dispositivo portatile per portali di Aperture Science.
description.koreana: 완전한 기능을 갖춘 애퍼처 사이언스 휴대용 포털 장치를 획득하십시오.
description.spanish: Adquiere el Dispositivo Portátil de Portales de Aperture Science de potencia completa.
description.schinese: 获得完整功能的光圈科技传送设备。
description.tchinese: 取得威力強大的「光圈科學手持傳送門裝置」。
description.russian: Получите полностью заряженную экспериментальную портальную пушку.
description.thai: ได้รับอุปกรณ์สร้างประตูมิติพกพาของ Aperture Science ที่สมบรูณ์แล้ว
description.japanese: 完全な状態の Aperture Science 携帯用ポータル装置を入手。
description.portuguese: Obtém o Dispositivo Portátil de Portais da Aperture Science totalmente carregado.
description.polish: Zdobądź Podręczne Urządzenie Portalowe Aperture Science o pełnej mocy.
description.danish: Få fat i den fuldt opladte håndholdte Aperture Science-portalenhed.
description.dutch: Verwerf het volledig opgeladen Aperture Science handportaltoestel.
description.finnish: Hanki täyteen ladattu Aperture Sciencen kannettava porttilaite.
description.norwegian: Få tak i den fullt lastede håndholdte portalenheten fra Aperture Science.
description.swedish: Skaffa Aperture Science fullt laddade, bärbara portalenhet.
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg a teljesen működőképes Aperture Science Hordozható Portál-eszközt.
description.czech: Získej plně vylepšené příruční portálové zařízení společnosti Aperture Science.
description.romanian: Procură Aparatul de Mână cu Portaluri Aperture Science la capacitate maximă.
description.turkish: Tam güçte Aperture Science Portatif Portal Aygıtı elde et.
description.brazilian: Adquira o Dispositivo Portátil de Portais da Aperture Science completo.
description.bulgarian: Вземете подобрената версия на портативното устройство за портали от Апъчър сайънс.

description.english: Do whatever it takes to survive.
description.german: Sie müssen überleben, ganz egal wie!
description.spanish: Haz todo lo que sea necesario para sobrevivir.
description.russian: Будьте готовым на все, чтобы выжить.
description.thai: ทำยังไงก็ได้ให้ตัวเองรอด
description.japanese: 手段を問わず、生き残る。
description.portuguese: Faz tudo o que for necessário para sobreviver.
description.danish: Gør, hvad der kræves for at overleve.
description.dutch: Doe alles wat nodig is om te overleven.
description.norwegian: Gjør det som må til for å overleve.
description.swedish: Gör allt som krävs för att överleva.
description.czech: Udělej všechno pro to, abys přežil.
description.brazilian: Faça o que for necessário para sobreviver.
description.bulgarian: Направете всичко възможно, за да оцелеете.

description.english: Make the correct party escort submission position decision.
description.german: Treffen Sie die richtige Entscheidung bei der Eskorte.
description.french: Choisissez la bonne position de sécurité pour l'escorte de la fête.
description.italian: Fai la scelta giusta a proposito della posizione di sottomissione al gruppo di sorveglianza.
description.spanish: Toma la decisión correcta en cuanto a la posición de recepción del comité de festejos.
description.schinese: 做出正确决定，摆好顺从姿势，等待派对同仁护送。
description.tchinese: 做出正確決定，擺好順從姿勢，等待派對同仁護送。
description.russian: Примите правильную позу ожидания распорядителя вечеринки.
description.thai: ตัดสินใจในการเข้ารับการคุ้มครองไปสู่งานปาร์ตี้ได้อย่างถูกต้อง
description.japanese: パーティーにエスコートしてもらえるよう、適切な姿勢をとる。
description.portuguese: Faz a decisão correta de posição de submissão ao acompanhante para a festa.
description.polish: Podejmij właściwą decyzję – przyjmij uległą postawę wobec grupy eskortującej.
description.danish: Træf den rette beslutning om festeskorteunderkastelsesstilling.
description.dutch: Neem de juiste beslissing over de feestelijke overgavehouding.
description.finnish: Tee oikea päätös asettua saatettavaksi juhliin.
description.norwegian: Ta riktig avgjørelse om posisjon i underkastelse for festeskorten.
description.swedish: Fatta rätt beslut om positionen för underkastelse för festeskort.
description.hungarian: Hozd meg a megfelelő döntést az ünnepségszervező-fogadási testtartással kapcsolatban.
description.czech: Uteč z mejdanu tou jedinou správně vybranou únikovou cestou.
description.romanian: Fă decizia corectă privind postul de escortă pentru petrecere.
description.turkish: Parti eşinin doğru konuma gitmesine yardım et.
description.brazilian: Tome a decisão correta em relação à posição de escolta para a festa.
description.bulgarian: Вземете правилното решение в смирена позиция за празничния ескорт.

description.thai: เล่น Portal จนจบ

description.german: Lassen Sie sich 9.000 Meter tief fallen.
description.thai: ร่วงหล่น 30,000 ฟุต
กระโดดสูง 300 ฟุต

description.german: Spielen Sie in Portal zwei fortgeschrittene Karten durch.
description.french: Terminez deux cartes avancées de Portal.
description.koreana: 고급 포털 실험실 두 곳을 클리어하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa dos mapas avanzados de Portal.
description.schinese: 完成两个传送门高级地图。
description.tchinese: 完成兩個傳送門高等地圖。
description.thai: เอาชนะ 2 แผนที่ระดับสูงของ Portal
description.japanese: ポータルの上級マップを 2 つクリア。
description.dutch: Versla twee geavanceerde maps van Portal.
description.hungarian: Juss át a Portal két továbbfejlesztett pályáján.
description.czech: Zdolej dvě pokročilé mapy ve hře Portal.
description.romanian: Termină două hărţi avansate din Portal.
description.turkish: İki ileri düzey Portal haritası bitir.
description.brazilian: Complete dois mapas avançados de Portal.
description.bulgarian: Минете две карти за напреднали в Portal.

description.german: Spielen Sie in Portal vier fortgeschrittene Karten durch.
description.french: Terminez quatre cartes avancées de Portal.
description.koreana: 고급 포털 실험실 네 곳을 클리어하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa cuatro mapas avanzados de Portal.
description.schinese: 完成四个传送门高级地图。
description.tchinese: 完成四個傳送門高等地圖。
description.thai: ผ่านด่าน advanced map ของ Portal 4 ด่าน
description.japanese: ポータルの上級マップを 4 つクリア。
description.dutch: Versla vier geavanceerde maps van Portal.
description.hungarian: Juss át a Portal négy továbbfejlesztett pályáján.
description.czech: Zdolej čtyři pokročilé mapy ve hře Portal.
description.romanian: Termină patru hărţi avansate din Portal.
description.turkish: Dört ileri düzey Portal haritası bitir.
description.brazilian: Complete quatro mapas avançados de Portal.
description.bulgarian: Минете четири карти за напреднали в Portal.

description.english: Beat all six Portal advanced maps.
description.german: Spielen Sie in Portal alle sechs fortgeschrittenen Karten durch.
description.french: Terminez les six cartes avancées de Portal.
description.italian: Supera tutte e sei le mappe Portal avanzate.
description.koreana: 고급 포털 실험실 여섯 곳을 클리어하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa los seis mapas avanzados de Portal.
description.schinese: 完成六个传送门高级地图。
description.tchinese: 完成全六個傳送門高等地圖。
description.thai: ผ่านด่าน advanced map ของ Portal ทั้ง 6 ด่าน
description.japanese: ポータルの上級マップを 6つ すべてクリア。
description.portuguese: Passa todos os seis mapas Portal avançados.
description.polish: Pokonaj wszystkie sześć zaawansowanych map Portalu.
description.dutch: Versla zes geavanceerde maps van Portal.
description.finnish: Läpäise kaikki kuusi Portalin vaativaa karttaa.
description.norwegian: Slå alle de seks avanserte portalkartene.
description.hungarian: Juss át a Portal mind a hat továbbfejlesztett pályáján.
description.czech: Zdolej všech šest pokročilých map ve hře Portal.
description.romanian: Termină toate cele şase hărţi avansate din Portal.
description.turkish: Tüm altı ileri düzey Portal haritasını da bitir.
description.brazilian: Complete todos os seis mapas avançados de Portal.
description.bulgarian: Минете всичките шест карти за напреднали в Portal.

description.english: Earn bronze medals on all Portal challenges.
description.german: Holen Sie sich in Portal bei allen Herausforderungen Bronze.
description.french: Remportez les médailles de bronze de tous les défis de Portal.
description.italian: Ottieni medaglie di bronzo in tutte le sfide Portal.
description.koreana: 모든 도전 포털 실험실에서 동메달 이상을 수상하십시오.
description.spanish: Gana la medalla de bronce en todos los desafíos de Portal.
description.schinese: 在所有传送门挑战中获得铜牌。
description.tchinese: 在所有傳送門挑戰中都拿到銅牌。
description.russian: Пройдите все испытания с бронзовыми медалями.
description.thai: ได้เหรียญทองแดงใน Portal challenges ทั้งหมด

description.dutch: Verdien bronzen medailles bij alle uitdagingen van Portal.
description.hungarian: Szerezz bronzérmet a Portal összes kihívásán.
description.czech: Získej bronzové medaile za všechny Portal výzvy.
description.romanian: Câştigă medalii de bronz la toate provocările din Portal.
description.turkish: Tüm Portal mücadelelerinden bronz madalya kazan.
description.brazilian: Consiga medalhas de bronze em todos os desafios de Portal.
description.bulgarian: Спечелете бронзов медал на всички предизвикателства в Portal.

description.russian: Пройдите все испытания с серебряными медалями.
description.thai: ได้เหรียญเงินใน Portal challenges ทั้งหมด

description.polish: Zdobądź złote medale we wszystkich wyzwaniach Portalu.

description.english: Detach security cameras from the walls.
description.german: Demontieren Sie Sicherheitskameras von den Wänden.
description.french: Détachez les caméras de surveillance des murs.
description.italian: Stacca dai muri le telecamere della sicurezza.
description.spanish: Desmonta las cámaras de seguridad de las paredes.
description.schinese: 拆掉墙上的安全摄像机。
description.tchinese: 拆掉牆上的監視攝影機。
description.thai: ถอดกล้องรักษาความปลอดภัยทุกตัวออกจากผนัง
description.japanese: 壁からセキュリティカメラをとる。
description.portuguese: Arranca as câmaras de segurança das paredes.
description.dutch: Haal de beveiligingscamera's van de muren.
description.hungarian: Szedd le a biztonsági kamerákat a falról.
description.romanian: Desprinde camerele de securitate de pe ziduri.
description.brazilian: Retire câmeras de segurança das paredes.
description.bulgarian: Откачете камерите за сигурност от стените.

description.english: Knock down a turret with another turret.
description.german: Zerstören Sie einen Turm mit einem anderen.
description.french: Détruisez une tourelle à l'aide d'une autre tourelle.
description.italian: Abbatti una torretta con un'altra torretta.
description.spanish: Derriba una torreta con otra torreta.
description.schinese: 使用一个炮塔击倒另一个炮塔。
description.russian: Сбейте пушку огнем из другой пушки.
description.thai: ทำให้ป้อมปืนล้มโดยใช้ป้อมปืนอีกตัว
description.japanese: タレットを別のタレットで倒す。
description.portuguese: Derruba um turret com outro turret.
description.polish: Zestrzel wieżyczkę za pomocą innej wieżyczki.
description.danish: Smadr et tårn med et andet tårn.
description.dutch: Sla een turret tegen de grond met een andere turret.
description.norwegian: Skyt ned en kanon med en annen kanon.
description.swedish: Slå ner ett torn med ett annat torn.
description.hungarian: Dönts le egy gépágyút egy másik gépágyúval.
description.czech: Zbav se střílny pomocí jiné střílny.
description.romanian: Doboară o santinelă folosind o altă santinelă.
description.turkish: Bir tareti başka bir taretle devir.
description.brazilian: Derrube uma torreta com outra torreta.
description.bulgarian: Повалете една сензорна картечница с друга такава.
